channel.title: [RSCDv25] How to make NPC attack you after some event?
channel.description:
It's just a little request - what do I need to add to rangeEvent.java to make NPC attack you after you shoot him/her? Or atleast be focused on you, if there was an obstacle on the way. Or is there some other file that needs to be modified? I would appreciate if you gave me var's name/function. I am learning, but don't have a clue, what needs to be done currently.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [RSCDv25] How to make NPC attack you after some event?
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Take a look at model/Mob.java, look at updatePosition() - think that’s the method, cba to look.

You’ll see how to move a Mob to a specific place. Then take a look further down for where it finds a victim and attacks them.

You should be able to cobble something together.

Read full topic
item.source: [RSCDv25] How to make NPC attack you after some event?
